subtitle: Minerals help grow a healthy baby
description: Minerals help grow a healthy baby
title: Why do I need minerals?
content:
Created by BabyCenter



Minerals help you to stay healthy and grow a healthy baby. If you eat foods from these 4 main food groups you will get the minerals you need.

•	Fruit and vegetables. Eating lots of different colored fruit and vegetables will give you lots of nutrients.

•	Starchy, filling foods, such as rice and potatoes. Base your meals around starchy foods. This will give you plenty of energy.

•	Protein-rich foods, such as beans, eggs, fish, poultry and meat. These foods are also good sources of iron. They will help you to stay strong.

•	Calcium-rich foods such as cow’s milk and soy milk, beans and sardines. 

By eating a range of these foods you will be able to stay fit and strong, as well as grow a healthy baby.
